title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Basic concepts of algorithms and their importance in computer science.

title: Data Structures
description: Study of different data structures like arrays, linked lists, trees, and graphs.

title: Sorting Algorithms
description: Various sorting algorithms including bubble sort, merge sort, and quicksort.

title: Dynamic Programming
description: Technique for solving complex problems by breaking them down into simpler subproblems.

title: Graph Algorithms
description: Algorithms to solve problems related to graphs such as traversal and shortest path.
